name: Mustang Survival Slipstream Harmonized Foam Front Zip PFD - Unisex
description: A low-profile PFD for the active paddler. With multiple pockets and lash points, it's configurable to hold rescue and routine-use gear from radios and flares to snacks and cameras.Durable 420-denier nylon ripstop is light and dries fastPadded neoprene shoulders provide a comfortable fit.Front zipper with Z-Strap cinch adjustment fits comfortably and securely.Fleece-lined zippered handwarmer pockets store personal items.Expanding cargo pockets carry a VHF radio and rescue gear.Meets Harmonized Level 70 buoyancy standard. Approved by Transport Canada and US Coast Guard.
